definitions.definition: A viscous preparation of oils and/or fats , usually containing medication , used as a treatment or as an emollient .
A substance used to anoint , as in religious rituals .

main_definition: ( medicine ) A viscous preparation of oils and/or fats , usually containing medication , used as a treatment or as an emollient .
secondary_definitions: A substance used to anoint , as in religious rituals .
